artist: Artist: Simon Gane; Author: Ian Lynam , et al.; Publisher: Slab-O-Concrete, Hove, U.K.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of figure lighting a cigarette, with text and designs, printed in yellow and black-and-white offset lithography on wove paper covers; 38 pp.
medium: Yellow and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: SAP, part 2
